abstract: Fans from around world will descend on London to see Benedict Cumberbatch, actor best known for his movie roles and as star of TV series Sherlock, play Hamlet in 12-week run at Barbican Theater; large and avid fanbase is comprised mostly of women who have formed global community through social media; many are unfamiliar with Shakespeare and have never been to England before but are willing to do almost anything for chance to see Cumberbatch in person.
lead_paragraph: Benedict Cumberbatch’s appearance as Hamlet in a 12-week run at the Barbican is easily the most anticipated event of the London theatrical season.

headline.main: Benedict Cumberbatch, a Hamlet Who’s One Hot Ticket in London
headline.print_headline: A Hamlet Who’s One Hot Ticket

snippet: Benedict Cumberbatch’s appearance as Hamlet in a 12-week run at the Barbican is easily the most anticipated event of the London theatrical season.
